topics.body:
A dude from laika had a panel at a con I went to earlier this year. He handed one of the puppet armatures around and let everyone fiddle with it. It was neat. 
He also let us handle some of the 3D printed faces from the paranorman and boxtrolls.

topics.body:
So we will be leaving work early today
So we can help my sister getting some furniture or something to her apartment
Unfortunately it means we have to drive to the middle of the city, which no one wants to drive in, no one likes city traffic
And then a bunch of other driving and shit to get it back to her place and get it in there
And then we go home

Im so glad I have a phone
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
